meanings.definition: The act of giving something to someone else.
meanings.sent1: The handover of the toy to his friend was done with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The handover of the package to the courier was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent3: During the handover of the cookies, they accidentally dropped some on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The handover of power from the old king to the new queen was a momentous occasion.
meanings.sent5: The handover of the keys symbolized the start of a new chapter in their lives.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring control or responsibility to another person or group.
meanings.sent1: The handover of the project to the new team leader went smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The handover of the business to the new owner was finalized last week.
meanings.sent3: During the handover of duties, they realized they had forgotten an important task.
meanings.sent4: The handover of authority from the manager to the assistant was a significant moment.
meanings.sent5: The handover of the company to the employees marked a new era of collaboration.
